summary.para: The DESIGNVECTOR structure is used by an application to specify values for the axes of a multiple master font.

remarks.para: The dvNumAxes member determines the actual size of dvValues, and thus, of DESIGNVECTOR. The constant MM_MAX_NUMAXES, which is 16, specifies the maximum allowed size of the dvValues array.
The PostScript Open Type Font does not support multiple master functionality.

summary.para: Number of values in the dvValues array.
An array specifying the values of the axes of a multiple master OpenType font. This array corresponds to the axlAxisInfo array in the structure.
